api_list.name: Create Feature Flag - random output + custom distribution
api_list.description: Create a feature flag with custom values (more than 2) and decide based on % how many time will you see the value
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flagside-apis.p.rapidapi.com/ff/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flagside-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create Feature flag - random output
api_list.description: Create a feature flag that will return different value randomly

api_list.name: UpdateFeatureFlag
api_list.description: Update the feature flag value and details

api_list.name: Create Simple Feature Flag
api_list.description:
Create a simple feature flag of type boolean, that will returned the predefined value.
If value not set, Feature flag will be set to true by default

api_list.name: Get Feature Flag Value
api_list.description: Optimized Endpoint to query the value of a feature Flag
